Table.tableName: Toxicity related to the combination of irinotecan/5-FU/gefitinib by dose
Table.tableFooter: Gefitinib dose was 250 mg daily and it was not reduced. 5-FU=5-fluorouracil.aNumber of patients who received the given irinotecan and 5-FU doses on cycle 1.bNumber of patients who received the given irinotecan and 5-FU doses on cycle 1 plus as reductions in subsequent cycles.

Document.DocumentTitle: A phase II trial of gefitinib with 5-fluorouracil, leucovorin, and irinotecan in patients with colorectal cancer
